content: Staff in the Pioneer AI Section – University of Copenhagen Department of Computer Science Department of Computer Science Department of Computer Science DIKU Staff Research staff Pioneer AI Mostafa Mehdipour Ghazi Assistant Professor Pioneer AI (P1AI) https://diku.dk/english/ Øster Voldgade 3 København K E-mail: ghazi@di.ku.dk View research profile and publications Head of Section Stefan SommerProfessorsommer@di.ku.dk LEARN MORE Visit the section website to learn more about our research and teaching.
